testsuite.name: Scenario: TC 4.7 - Edit a Recipe, error path - recipe number that is empty

testcase.name: Given a recipe book with an empty recipe in it (recipe has been deleted)
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 4.7 - Edit a Recipe, error path - recipe number that is empty

testcase.name: And the coffee maker is in waiting state
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 4.7 - Edit a Recipe, error path - recipe number that is empty

testcase.name: And the user has selected edit a recipe
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 4.7 - Edit a Recipe, error path - recipe number that is empty

testcase.name: Then the user cannot edit a recipe if they enter a recipe number that is not valid "1"
testcase.classname: Scenario: TC 4.7 - Edit a Recipe, error path - recipe number that is empty
